entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: A ghost who is a member of the Hogwarts staff and is known for his knowledge.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A first-year student at Hogwarts who is uncomfortable with Nearly Headless Nick leaning through him.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: The Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts who is waiting to read out the list of first years' names and gives a scorching look to whispering students.

entities.name: abercombie
entities.description: A first-year student at Hogwarts whose name is called by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A first-year student at Hogwarts who notices the terrified-looking boy Abercrombie earlier.

relationships.description: Nearly Headless Nick leans through Neville, causing him discomfort.
Professor McGonagall calls out Abercrombie's name from the list of first years' names.
